Apr 3

Scoop’s Top Plays With Brandon ‘Scoop B’ Robinson, Monday 3rd of April

Terrence Ross’ 360 dunk, Hassan Whiteside’s at the buzzer in Detroit, Starting at power forward for the Utah Jazz, Joe Johnson’s near triple double and LeBron James’ attempt at coaching are all the latest culprits to this week’s instalment to #ScoopsTopPlays.

Produced by Brooklyn’s own, DJ Manny El, it’s worth a watch!

CHECK IT OUT!

With stops as a writer at CBS and The Source Magazine, Brandon ‘Scoop B’ Robinson is currently a managing editor and feature columnist at RESPECT Magazine.

Scoop B brings his expertise exclusively to 16 Wins A Ring every Monday with his #ScoopsTopPlays. The 1 minute segment began via his Instagram account in 2015, Scoop’s Top Plays has been a go to for viewers looking for a mix of sports and pop culture.

While you’re enjoying Scoop’s Top Plays earlier in the week, make sure to round out your week by listening to the Scoop B Radio Podcast.

#ScoopBRadio is a mix of sports and entertainment interviews never heard before. Learn more by visiting ScoopBRadio.com.

You can also follow and subscribe to Scoop B Radio on these platforms for your listening convenience:

iTunes: https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/scoop-b-radio-scoopbradio/id1100828006?mt=2

Stitcher Radio: http://www.stitcher.com/podcast/scoop-b-radio

Tune In: http://tunein.com/radio/Scoop-B-Radio–SCOOPBRADIO–Brandon-Robinson-p884354/
